title: Lawyers: Nearly $1B tentative settlement in condo collapse - The Associated Press
content:
1. Lawyers: Nearly $1B tentative settlement in condo collapse  The Associated Press
  2. $997 Million Settlement Agreed To In Class Action Lawsuit Over Surfside Condo Collapse  CBS Miami
  3. Surfside Condo Collapse Victims Reach $997 Million Settlement  The New York Times
  4. Suit over Champlain Towers collapse settled for $997 million  Miami Herald
  5. Condo collapse victims reach $997 million settlement  CBS Evening News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. (AP) â€” A nearly $1 billion tentative settlement has been reached in a class-action lawsuit brought by families of victims and survivors of last June's condominium collapse in Surfside, Florida , an attorney said Wednesday.
